
 Task 2
My f32 epsilon = 0.00000011920929
std::f32::EPSILON = 0.00000011920929
My f64 epsilon = 0.0000000000000002220446049250313
std::f64::EPSILON = 0.0000000000000002220446049250313

 Task 3
sum_a-1 = 0 should be 0.00000000011102230246251565
sum_b-1 = 0.00000000011102230246251565 should be 0.00000000011102230246251565

 Task 4
d1=0.7999999999999999
d2=0.8
d1==d2 ? => false
d1~=d2 ? => true
